mapper.sql: select c.cno, c.eno, c.tno, c.name, c.team_num, c.join_num, c.cost, c.sdt, c.edt, c.rsdt, c.redt, c.content, c.poster, c.pst_no, c.bas_addr, c.oper, e.eno, e.name as e_name, t.tno, t.name as t_name
mapper.select:
from competition c left outer join event e on c.eno = e.eno left outer join team t on c.tno = t.tno
where
c.eno=#{event}
and c.bas_addr like concat('%',#{addr},'%') c.bas_addr like concat('%',#{addr},'%')
and c.name like concat('%',#{search1},'%') c.name like concat('%',#{search1},'%')
and c.content like concat('%',#{search2},'%') c.content like concat('%',#{search2},'%')
order by c.rsdt desc c.rsdt asc
,c.sdt desc c.sdt desc
,c.sdt asc c.sdt asc
,c.sdt desc c.sdt desc
,c.sdt asc c.sdt asc
order by c.cno desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into competition(eno, tno, name, team_num, join_num, cost, sdt, edt, rsdt, redt, content, poster, pst_no, bas_addr, oper) values(#{eno}, #{tno}, #{name}, #{teamNum}, #{joinNum}, #{cost}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{recruitStartDate}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{content}, #{poster}, #{postNo}, #{baseAddr}, #{operation})
mapper.update: update competition set eno = #{eno}, tno = #{tno}, name = #{name}, team_num = #{teamNum}, join_num = #{joinNum}, cost = #{cost}, sdt = #{startDate}, edt = #{endDate}, rsdt = #{recruitStartDate}, redt = #{recruitEndDate}, content = #{content}, poster = #{poster}, pst_no = #{postNo}, bas_addr = #{baseAddr}, oper = #{operation} where cno=#{no}
mapper.select: from competition c left outer join event e on c.eno = e.eno left outer join team t on c.tno = t.tno where c.cno=#{no}
